thread.title: Demi Lovato poses topless; 'X-Files' trailer; LL Cool J's son arrested: AM Buzz
thread.title_full: Demi Lovato poses topless; 'X-Files' trailer; LL Cool J's son arrested: AM Buzz | syracuse.com

author: Geoff Herbert | gherbert@syracuse.com
title: Demi Lovato poses topless; 'X-Files' trailer; LL Cool J's son arrested: AM Buzz
text:
"Confident" singer Demi Lovato is topless in a racy new photo shoot for Complex magazine, posing on a banana as she opens up about a wide range of topics. The former "X-Factor" judge denied previously dating "Orange is the New Black" star Ruby Rose (though she did say "love is fluid") and says she's the "happiest that I've ever been" with boyfriend Wilmer Valderrama. Lovato, 23, added that she's no longer friends with Selena Gomez but denies it had anything to do with Justin Bieber.
» See photos and read more at the Daily Mail .
If you're feeling underwhelmed by this fall's new TV shows , you'll perk up when you see the first full-length trailer for "The X-Files" revival coming in the midseason. "In 2002, my investigation ceased, but my personal obsession did not," Mulder (David Duchovny) says as Scully (Gillian Anderson) is seen answering his call in an intensive care unit. The truth is still out there, for at least six episodes, starting Jan. 24 on Fox.
LL Cool J's son was arrested in New York City on Tuesday after being thrown out of a swanky club. "I didn't do anything," 26-year-old Najee Smith told police. "This is bulls---." The oldest son of the rapper-actor was accused of being intoxicated and causing a disturbance, but didn't comment when he was released Tuesday -- though he laughed when one of his friends who was already arrested spit in the face of a paparazzo.
» Read more at the New York Daily News .
And Matt Damon acted out all of his movies in 8 minutes for a skit with "The Late Late Show" host James Corden. The pair nailed all of his biggest films, from "Good Will Hunting" and "The Talented Mr. Ripley" to the Jason Bourne and "Ocean's Eleven" franchises -- though he just carried cardboard cut-outs of his co-stars for the latter. Corden goofed on "The Martian," though, when he came out dressed as an alien: "Well I haven't seen the movie yet."
